Plot: Afraid her husband will fall back with his ex girlfriend after they're assigned to work together, Adriana and her sister set sail to the U.S. to go after him to stop this from happening.
Title: S.O.S.: Mulheres ao Mar 2
Writer: Sylvio Gonçalves (screenplay), Bruno Garotti (screenplay), Flávia Guimarães (script collaborator)
Actors: Giovanna Antonelli, Thalita Carauta, Fabiula Nascimento, Reynaldo Gianecchini
